attributes.action: After COVID-19 pandemic, quarantine hoarders until they've eaten their supply
attributes.additional_details: Because you're not doing anything to prevent or punish this disgusting greedy behaviour, leaving the vulnerable, elderly and disabled as well as vital workers unable to get food and supplies.
attributes.background: The public have shown themselves to be selfish and greedy: quarantine all people who have bought more than they will ever need and ban them from supermarkets until they've eaten their selfishly hoarded stash.

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about the availability of food, we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Banning specific customers from supermarkets would be a matter for individual retailers.

You may wish to sign one of these petitions:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300766
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302190

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
